channel.title: Alison Game Musician on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Alison Game Musician on FinanClub

item.title: Ecrett Music: Using AI for Composing Game Music
item.description: Introduction Ecrett Music is a service that uses simple inputs to create tracks that fit the exact type of mood required. It is re-defining the generation of functional music that enhances another medium. The service is equipped to deliver royalty-free background music for videos, games and podcasts.

item.title: Recommended Music Composing Software for Game Developers
item.description: If you are a game developer looking for easy-to-use music composing software, you may want to check out these recommendations from Reddit’s gamedev subreddit. Bosca Ceoil - Bosca Ceoil is a free and open-source music creation tool that is designed to be easy to use.
